channel.title: Updating Items
channel.description:
I know there are many tutorials to update your items so your server can work with them, but how exactly do you do it, because none of the tutorials actually work on my server, even though I'm using a Hybrid Source.
I want them to stop turning into that noted item that doesn't go into the bank.

item.title: Updating Items
item.dc:creator: @skandoluzz skandoluzz
item.description:
@skandoluzz wrote:

ok, im using whitescape, and i replaced all of the 6540 and entered 10000, but it still crashes, am i forgeting something?
thanks in advance
skandoluzz
nevermind, got them to spawn, but i cannot pick em up aswell lol, and once again, items over 7000 crash me lol

Read full topic

item.title: Updating Items
item.dc:creator: @Calvin Calvin
item.description:
@Calvin wrote:

Meh, I’ll try it[br][size=1]Posted at: April 04, 2006, 12:31:44 am[/size][hr]Ok, I tried it, and it spawned them, but as soon as I go to items over 7000, it crashes the server when I try to pick them up.

Read full topic

item.title: Updating Items
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

^^ Nope, it happens because the server he’s using on doesn’t support new items, and I really hope it’s not his server because it’s soo easy to fix =P, just go into client.java and replace all 6540 with 10000 or a number above 8000 (the higher means it’ll support updates, cos the number we change is the highest item id), see it was to fix a bug where if you had an unsupported item for the server it would do that, but most servers now support new items

Read full topic

item.title: Updating Items
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

This is in the wrong server, and make sure you’re compiling that code?

And if you don’t want it to be a noted item, you have the wrong item id.

Read full topic
